title: 南華早報：港府考慮重新關閉酒吧！

replies.msg:
https://www.scmp.com/news/hong-kong/health-environment/article/3104480/hong-kong-facing-11-new-covid-19-cases-government

Hong Kong was expected to record 11 new Covid-19 cases on Wednesday, as a government source revealed officials were mulling another citywide closure of pubs and bars.

All eyes are on a potentially growing cluster of infections linked to a Tsim Sha Tsui bar, after a Thai woman and a 22-year-old local student visited the China Secret venue on the same night and later tested positive for the coronavirus.

Authorities believed the Thai patient was among a group of 10 women from the country working illegally as bar hostesses on tourist visas﻿, the Post reported earlier. They were all at the establishment in Hart Avenue on September 23.
